HomePage.title: Web Developer
HomePage.intro: I'm Killian, a web developer passionate about creating innovative online experiences. Explore my portfolio to see how I merge technology and creativity.

About.about_desc: With 5 years of experience in web development, I have worked on a variety of projects ranging from showcase sites to complex web applications. Learn more about my background and my passion for development.

Portfolio.unicancer_description: Project manager and web application developer in a team of about ten people, utilizing PHP/Symfony, JavaScript, and SQL technologies to design and implement innovative solutions.
Portfolio.univevry_description: Project manager in charge of redesigning an intranet tool for university students and staff, using PHP, Joomla, JavaScript, and MySQL technologies to enhance internal accessibility and efficiency.
Portfolio.ipssi_position: Master in AI, Big Data & Development
Portfolio.ipssi_description: Advanced training in artificial intelligence technologies, including Machine Learning and Deep Learning, and learning various frameworks such as Next.js, React.js, Django, and Flask, as well as DevOps technologies (Docker, Kubernetes). Defense and validation of an expert dissertation on artificial intelligence applied to language learning.
Portfolio.univevryschool_position: Professional Bachelor's Degree in Web & Mobile Development
Portfolio.univevryschool_description: Acquired foundational knowledge in DevOps technologies, computer networks, frameworks (Symfony, React.js), CMS (WordPress, Joomla), and mobile development technologies with Flutter.

Projects.pomodoro_desc: Pomodoro work technique including music, timer management, a to-do list, theme management, and work statistics.
Projects.socnet_desc: Reproduction of a fictional social network with management of relationships, posts, comments, likes, and account management.
Projects.hover_project: Hover over a project name to learn more.
Projects.youbotbuster_desc: SaaS tool using AI to automate the removal of spam comments under YouTube videos.
Projects.meetsponsors_desc: Creation of a “For You” algorithm using AI to efficiently connect content creators with sponsors.

saas.title: SaaS Development
saas.description: Transform your ideas into powerful SaaS platforms. Custom solutions to automate and simplify your business operations.

showcase.title: Showcase Websites
showcase.description: Showcase your business. Modern websites for restaurants, cafes, or shops, optimized for local visibility.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Launch your online store with ease. Fast, secure, and ready-to-sell e-commerce solutions.

customapps.title: Custom Web Applications
customapps.description: Web tools designed for your business. Intuitive and efficient applications to meet your specific needs.

optimization.title: Optimization and Maintenance
optimization.description: Keep your site fast and secure. Audits, optimization, and maintenance for optimal performance.

consulting.title: Consulting and Support
consulting.description: Advance confidently in the digital world. Expert advice and tailored support for your projects.
